content: no sew chonk guinea pig materials chenille yarn two colors main body and accent color my examples use beige as main and black as accent 7mm hook 12mm safety eyes polyfill terminology single_crochet - single_crochet increase - single_crochet increase decrease - single_crochet decrease chain - chain bobble - 5dc bobble stitch yo insert hook into st pull up pull through two loops yo insert hook into same st pull up pull through 2 loops - 4 times yo pull through all 6 loops when text is red change color to use accent color no sew chonk guinea pig pattern using main color and 7mm hook accent color in red r1 7 single_crochet in a magic_ring 7 r2 increase - 7 times 14 r 3 1 single_crochet increase - 7 times 21 r 4 2 single_crochet increase - 7 times 28 r5 single_crochet around 28 r6 10sc bobble 6sc bobble 10sc 28 r8 single_crochet around 28 r9 3sc bobble 21sc bobble 3sc 28 -now s a good time to add your safety eyes between rounds 3-4 and sew nose details r10-11 single_crochet around 28 r12 10sc 10sc 8sc 28 -the stripe should line up between the ears you may need to adjust the placement r13 single_crochet around 28 r14 11sc 10sc 7sc 28 -the stripe should line up with the other stripe you may need to adjust the placement r15 single_crochet around 28 r16 5sc bobble 21sc bobble 28 -the paws should line up with the front paws you may need to adjust a few stitches to get them in line r17 15sc single_crochet ch3 single_crochet in the second chain from the hook 1sc slip_stitch in the same st as the single_crochet 11 single_crochet 27 + 1 tail r18 2sc decrease - 7 times 21 r19 1sc decrease - 7 times 14 r20 decrease - 7 times 7 sew closed
